title: Visual working memory: Study of Task fMRI and Behavioural response
description: Nineteen right-handed healthy adults (aged from 18-28 years old) participated in this study on the same 3 T MRI scanner. Axial 3D T1-weighted images were acquired as well as three runs of bold task MRI with the recording of their related behavorial data. Dataset DOI: 10.18112/openneuro.ds001634.v1.0.1
licenses: Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC-BY 4.0). To acknowledge, cite this publication: Eyal Soreq, Robert Leech & Adam Hampshire. Dynamic network coding of working-memory domains and working-memory processes. Nature Communications, (2019)10:936.
